# u-list

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                                         | Type                              | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignment` | `alignment`  | list as row(x) or as column(y)                                                                                                                      | `"x" \| "y"`                      | `'y'`       |
| `listStyle` | `list-style` | list style of unordered list, [possible values](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/list-style-type)                                   | `string`                          | `'none'`    |
| `ordered`   | `ordered`    | per default list is unordered, set true for ordered list                                                                                            | `boolean`                         | `false`     |
| `reversed`  | `reversed`   | reverse the list                                                                                                                                    | `boolean`                         | `undefined` |
| `start`     | `start`      | start of the ordered list                                                                                                                           | `number`                          | `undefined` |
| `type`      | `type`       | ordered list type, a = lowercase letters, A = uppercase letters, i = lowercase romanian letters, I = uppercase romanian letters, 1 = arabic numbers | `"1" \| "A" \| "I" \| "a" \| "i"` | `undefined` |

## Slots

| Slot        | Description |
| ----------- | ----------- |
| `"default"` | list items  |
